we handling - procuring & supplying of products

We believe in long term business relationship and great customer service and work towards the same. In doing so we offer special offers and services that are provided by our trusted suppliers and product manufactures.

Dar Al Falah General Trading...

We are trusted and reputed company in UAE for procuring and supplying of products like Banding tapes, Packaging items, Lanyard, badge reel, access card, Promotional and gift products ,Electronics and IT accessories, Office stationeries, Printing stationeries, stickers, labels, booklets, paper rolls... all products at competitive pricing with the added benefit of a customer friendly environment.

Full transparency

Most of our competitors will try to upsell you on your requirments - we believe in honest client interactions and will always keep your best interests in mind. We believe in long term business relationship and great customer service and work towards the same. In doing so we offer special offers and services that are provided by our trusted suppliers and product manufactures.

Our commitment

Inustries resources allow Dar Al Falah to obtain superior products and materials at the lowest prices while always maintaining the highest quality and standards. This on going commitment maintaining solid client relationships is what allows ‘DAF’ to be the most trusted name in the industry.
